description: Full-featured automation bot for Erenshor inspired by WoW-Glider - AFK grinding, combat, looting, waypoints, and 2D radar GUI

userStories.title: Research Erenshor Technical Integration
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to understand how to interface with Erenshor so I can choose the right technical approach.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify available integration methods (memory reading, mod support, API hooks)
Determine how to read game state (player position, health, mana, target, nearby entities)
Determine how to send inputs (movement, abilities, interactions)
userStories.notes: Critical first step - all other stories depend on this research

userStories.title: Project scaffolding and build setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the project structure and build tooling set up so I can start implementing features.
acceptanceCriteria: Initialize project with chosen technology stack based on US-001 findings
Set up build configuration (package.json, Cargo.toml, or equivalent)
Create folder structure: src/, docs/, profiles/, waypoints/
Add basic README with setup instructions
userStories.notes: C# BepInEx 5.x plugin with .NET 4.7.2. Uses BepInEx.Core and UnityEngine.Modules packages.

userStories.title: Game state reader - player position
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to read the player's current position so I can navigate.
acceptanceCriteria: Read player x, y, z coordinates from game

userStories.title: Game state reader - player vitals
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to read player health, mana, and level so I can make combat decisions.
acceptanceCriteria: Read player level and current XP

userStories.title: Game state reader - combat state
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to know if I'm in combat, casting, or dead.
acceptanceCriteria: Read combat state (in combat / out of combat)

userStories.title: Game state reader - current target
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to read information about my current target.
acceptanceCriteria: Read if player has a target
Read target name, level, health percentage

userStories.title: Game state reader - nearby entities
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to detect nearby mobs, NPCs, and nodes.
acceptanceCriteria: Read list of entities within configurable radius
For each entity: position, name, type (mob/NPC/node/corpse)
For mobs: level, hostility, health percentage

userStories.title: Game state reader - inventory
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to read inventory state for bag management.
acceptanceCriteria: Read total bag slots and free slots
Read list of items in bags (name, quantity, quality)

userStories.title: Game state reader - buffs and debuffs
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to read active buffs/debuffs for rotation decisions.
acceptanceCriteria: Read list of active buffs on player (name, remaining duration)
Read list of active debuffs on player

userStories.title: Input controller - movement
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to send movement inputs to control the character.
acceptanceCriteria: Support press and release (not just toggle)

userStories.title: Input controller - targeting and interaction
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to select targets and interact with objects.
acceptanceCriteria: Send target specific entity by ID/reference

userStories.title: Input controller - abilities
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to activate abilities and spells.
acceptanceCriteria: Send ability activation by ability ID (if available)

userStories.title: Navigation - move to point
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to move to specific coordinates.
acceptanceCriteria: Accept target x, y, z coordinates
Move toward target using input controller
Stop when within configurable distance of target

userStories.title: Navigation - stuck detection
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to detect when I'm stuck and try to unstick.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect when position hasn't changed despite movement input
Attempt unstuck behavior (jump, strafe, back up)
Report stuck state if unstuck fails after configurable attempts

userStories.title: Navigation - face target
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to face a specific direction or entity.
acceptanceCriteria: Turn to face target using turn inputs
Stop turning when facing within tolerance

userStories.title: Waypoint data model
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a data structure for waypoints.
acceptanceCriteria: Define Waypoint type: position, type (normal/vendor/repair/node), metadata
Define WaypointPath type: name, list of waypoints, loop setting
Save/load waypoint paths to/from JSON files

userStories.title: Waypoint recording
userStories.description: As a user, I want to record waypoints as I play.
acceptanceCriteria: Capture position at configurable interval while recording
Assign waypoint type during or after recording

userStories.title: Waypoint playback
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to follow a recorded waypoint path.
acceptanceCriteria: Move to each waypoint in sequence using navigation
Loop to start or reverse at path end (configurable)
Find nearest waypoint when starting mid-path

userStories.title: Combat profile data model
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a data structure for combat rotations.
acceptanceCriteria: Define Ability type: name/ID, keybind, cooldown
Define Condition type: health/mana threshold, buff check, target health
Define RotationEntry type: ability, conditions, priority
Define CombatProfile type: name, class, rotation entries

userStories.title: Combat profile loader
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to load combat profiles from files.
acceptanceCriteria: Store loaded profile for combat system to use

userStories.title: Combat - target selection
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to select appropriate targets.
acceptanceCriteria: Find nearest hostile enemy within level range
Skip enemies too far from waypoint path

userStories.title: Combat - rotation execution
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to execute abilities based on the combat profile.
acceptanceCriteria: Evaluate conditions for each rotation entry
Execute highest priority ability that passes conditions

userStories.title: Combat - engagement loop
userStories.description: As a bot, I need a complete combat loop from pull to loot.

userStories.title: Looting system
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to loot corpses after combat.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect lootable corpses in nearby entities

userStories.title: Rest and recovery
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to recover health/mana between fights.
acceptanceCriteria: If below threshold and out of combat, use food/drink
Wait for regen if no consumables

userStories.title: Death detection and recovery
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to handle death.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect player death via combat state
Track death count for safety limits

userStories.title: Grinding mode state machine
userStories.description: As a bot, I need a grinding mode that coordinates all systems.
acceptanceCriteria: State machine: idle -> pathing -> pulling -> combat -> looting -> resting -> repeat

userStories.title: Auto-mapping - node discovery
userStories.description: As a user, I want the bot to record resource node locations.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect resource nodes in nearby entities
Record node position, type, and timestamp
Avoid duplicate entries for same location (within radius)

userStories.title: Auto-mapping - NPC and mob discovery
userStories.description: As a user, I want the bot to record NPC and mob locations.
acceptanceCriteria: Record NPC locations with name and type
Record mob spawn points with name, level, and type

userStories.title: Configuration data model
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a configuration system.
acceptanceCriteria: Define Config type with all bot settings
Include thresholds, timing, hotkeys, file paths
Merge with sensible defaults for missing values

userStories.title: Statistics tracking
userStories.description: As a user, I want session statistics tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: Track items looted and gold earned
Expose stats via API for GUI

userStories.title: Action logging
userStories.description: As a user, I want a log of bot actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Log all significant actions with timestamps
Log state transitions, targets, abilities used
Store recent logs in memory for GUI display

userStories.title: Safety - emergency stop
userStories.description: As a user, I want an emergency stop hotkey.
acceptanceCriteria: Register global hotkey that works even when game is focused
Immediately stop all bot activity when pressed

userStories.title: Safety - auto-stop conditions
userStories.description: As a user, I want the bot to stop automatically under certain conditions.
acceptanceCriteria: Stop if stuck for too long

userStories.title: GUI - main window scaffold
userStories.description: As a user, I want a desktop GUI application.
acceptanceCriteria: Create desktop app window using chosen framework
Basic layout: header, main content area, status bar
System tray support with minimize option

userStories.title: GUI - bot controls
userStories.description: As a user, I want Start/Stop/Pause buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons reflect current state (disabled when not applicable)

userStories.title: GUI - status display
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see current bot status.
acceptanceCriteria: Display current state (idle, grinding, combat, resting, etc.)
Display current target name if any

userStories.title: GUI - session statistics panel
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see session stats.
acceptanceCriteria: Display gold earned and items looted

userStories.title: GUI - action log panel
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see recent bot actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Color-coding by action type (combat, loot, state change)

userStories.title: GUI - 2D radar canvas
userStories.description: As a user, I want a 2D radar showing nearby entities.
acceptanceCriteria: Player centered with facing direction indicator

userStories.title: GUI - radar entity rendering
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see entities on the radar.
acceptanceCriteria: Render hostile mobs as red dots
Render neutral mobs as yellow dots
Render friendly NPCs as green dots
Render resource nodes with distinct icons

userStories.title: GUI - radar waypoint overlay
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see my waypoint path on the radar.

userStories.title: GUI - profile selector
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select a combat profile from the GUI.

userStories.title: GUI - waypoint path selector
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select a waypoint path from the GUI.

userStories.title: GUI - settings panel
userStories.description: As a user, I want to edit common settings in the GUI.
acceptanceCriteria: Form for key settings (thresholds, timings, hotkeys)
Save button writes to config file

userStories.title: Gathering mode state machine
userStories.description: As a user, I want a gathering-focused mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Prioritize moving to resource nodes over combat
Continue to next node on path

userStories.title: Inventory management - bag space check
userStories.description: As a bot, I need to check bag space and trigger vendor runs.
acceptanceCriteria: Check free bag slots after looting
If bags full and vendor waypoint exists, path to vendor
Return to grinding path after vendor

userStories.title: Export/Import - waypoints and profiles
userStories.description: As a user, I want to export and import waypoints and profiles.
acceptanceCriteria: Export waypoint path to standalone JSON file
Export combat profile to standalone JSON file

userStories.title: Export map data
userStories.description: As a user, I want to export discovered map data.
acceptanceCriteria: Export node/NPC/mob discoveries from SQLite to JSON

userStories.title: Create baseline class profiles
userStories.description: As a user, I want pre-built profiles for Erenshor classes.
acceptanceCriteria: Create one JSON profile per Erenshor class
Profiles include self-healing if class has it
userStories.notes: Requires knowing Erenshor classes from US-001 research
